introduction: Sex TV: She Comes FirstAsexuality is one of the latest sexual closets to open. SexTV traveled across North America and talked to people who identify as asexual about their experience. Hell House is a documentary about a controversial Christian outreach program that combines the classic morality play with the modern haunted house. SexTV speaks with the director of the films about the horrors of Hell House which include adultery, abortion and homosexuality. According to Ian Kerner, clinical sexologist and evangelist of the female orgasm, oral sex has long been deemed an optional aspect of foreplay, but, in fact, it's coreplay -- simply the best way for leading a woman through the entire process of sexual response. We talked to Kerner about the sexual techniques outlined in his latest book She Comes First.
